description: Creates <b:magenta>sticky</> magical <b:magenta>webs</> that <b:magenta>entangle</> and <b:magenta>immobilize</> the target.
notes: Crowd control spell that webs target for level/2 rounds. Does not break on damage.

messages.wearoffToTarget: The webs holding you in place dissolve.
messages.successToVictim: You are tangled in a glowing web!
messages.successToCaster: You tangle {target} in a glowing web!
messages.lookMessage: {pronoun.subjective} is covered in sticky webs.

name: Wings Of Heaven
description: Manifests angelic wings that grant the power of flight.
notes: Grants flight for level*2 rounds.

messages.wearoffToTarget: Your wings gently fold back and fade away.
messages.successToVictim: Wings of light unfurl from your back.
messages.successToRoom: Wings of light unfurl from {target}'s back.
messages.failToCaster: The heavens reject your dark soul!
messages.successToSelf: Wings of light unfurl from your back.
messages.successSelfRoom: Wings of light unfurl from {actor}'s back.
messages.lookMessage: {pronoun.subjective} has glowing angelic wings sprouting from {pronoun.possessive} back.

name: Wings Of Hell
description: Manifests demonic wings that grant the power of flight.
notes: Grants flight for level*2 rounds.

messages.wearoffToTarget: Your giant bat-like wings fold up and vanish.
messages.successToVictim: Giant bat-like wings sprout from your back.
messages.successToRoom: Giant bat-like wings sprout from {target}'s back.
messages.failToCaster: Hell rejects your pure soul!
messages.successToSelf: Giant bat-like wings sprout from your back.
messages.successSelfRoom: Giant bat-like wings sprout from {actor}'s back.
messages.lookMessage: {pronoun.subjective} has dark, leathery demonic wings sprouting from {pronoun.possessive} back.

name: Wizard Eye
description: Creates an <cyan>invisible</> magical sensor that reveals <cyan>hidden</> things within the zone.
notes: One-time reveal of hidden creatures/objects within the zone.

name: Word Of Command
description: Speaks a word of power that compels the target to obey the caster.
notes: Charm spell forcing obedience for level/4 rounds.

messages.successToCaster: You cast word of command on {target}.
messages.successToVictim: {actor} casts word of command on you!
messages.wearoffToTarget: The effects of word of command wear off.

name: Word Of Recall
description: The caster will be transferred back to his hometown sanctuary (usually the Temple of Midgaard).
notes: Instantly returns caster to their hometown sanctuary.

messages.successToCaster: You vanish in a flash of light!
messages.successToRoom: {actor} vanishes in a flash of light!

name: World Teleport
description: Teleports the caster to a random location anywhere in the world.
notes: Long-range random teleportation across the entire world.

messages.successToCaster: You vanish in a flash of light!
messages.successToRoom: {actor} vanishes in a flash of light!

name: Writhing Weeds
description: Animates plants and weeds to attack and entangle the target with crushing force.
notes: Nature damage spell requiring outdoors. Formula: dam + (pow(skill, 2) * 53) / 10000.

params.base_damage_note: base_damage is calculated from spell circle and caster level

messages.successToCaster: A crop of dry weeds springs from the ground, choking {target}.
messages.successToVictim: A crop of dry weeds springs from the ground, choking you.
messages.successToRoom: A crop of dry weeds springs from the ground, choking {target}.
messages.failToCaster: Your spell seems to have missed!
messages.failToVictim: {actor}'s spell missed you!
